backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the SurgiPaw backend with types for surgery cases, tasks, and user profiles, plus CRUD operations for cases and user profiles with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping four UI feature requests (compact cards, relocated New Case button, species icons, and completed-case search inclusion) to their relevant frontend files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Cached one-to-two sentence summaries of every frontend source file, describing each component's purpose, key props, and notable implementation details for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, chart palette, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the SurgiPaw PWA, setting up favicons, manifest, Apple web-app meta tags, and mounting the React app at the root div.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for SurgiPaw specifying app name, theme color, standalone display mode, and 192×192/512×512 icon references.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a cache-first strategy that precaches the app shell on install, cleans old caches on activate, and caches static assets at runtime while skipping auth and API requests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the sticky navigation header with the '+ New Case' button and Dashboard/Cases/Settings nav, managing view state, case creation dialog, and profile setup modal for authenticated users.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Empty file with no content; likely a placeholder for an authentication context.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Au: Empty file with no content; likely a placeholder for an authentication view component.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog that prompts a new user to enter their name and saves their profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines checklist items (discharge notes, labs, imaging, etc.) for surgery cases and provides utility functions to compute task completion counts, remaining items, and Tailwind color classes.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Displays a collapsible card for a surgery case showing patient info, species icon, and an interactive checklist for toggling task completion.
Dialog form for creating a new surgery case with fields for patient details, checklist selection, quick-fill text parsing, and speech recognition support.
Renders a filterable, searchable, and sortable grid of surgery case cards with controls for species, task type, completion status, and CSV import/export.
Search input component with a clear button for filtering cases by any field.
Dropdown select control for choosing the sort order of the cases list.
Popover filter component for selecting one or more species to filter cases, with state persisted to sessionStorage.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by task types, persisting selections to sessionStorage. Displays checkboxes for each checklist item and a badge showing the active filter count.

A checklist editor component that supports two modes: 'creation' (toggling which tasks are selected) and 'completion' (toggling which selected tasks are done). Renders colored checkbox items from CHECKLIST_ITEMS.
A panel component providing CSV export and import functionality for surgery cases, with progress tracking, error display, and create/update backend mutations.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A date input component supporting manual MM/DD/YYYY entry with auto-slash insertion and a calendar popover picker, with blur validation and auto-advance on completion.
Provides exportCasesToCsv and importCasesFromCsv functions for serializing/deserializing surgery cases to/from a 17-column CSV format, including field parsing and duplicate detection.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the CSV schema constants, headers, TypeScript types, and validation values (species, sex, boolean formats) for the veterinary surgery case import/export format.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Provides functions to filter surgery cases by species, by incomplete task types, by all tasks completed, or by having at least one incomplete task.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: React hook that wraps the browser Web Speech API to provide speech-to-text recording with state for transcript, recording status, errors, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors (O/0, I/1/l), and removing artifacts like pipes and excessive dashes.
Parses label:value formatted text lines into a partial CaseFormData object, mapping recognized field labels to typed values including species, sex, dates, and string fields.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates and triggers a browser print dialog for a landscape HTML table report of surgery cases with remaining tasks, using a hidden iframe without external PDF libraries.
Generates and downloads a CSV file of surgery cases including remaining checklist tasks, using browser Blob/URL APIs without external dependencies.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Utility functions for formatting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex enum values into human-readable strings for PDF display, plus text truncation and task list formatting.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Utility functions for formatting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex enum values into human-readable strings specifically for CSV report output.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters an array of SurgeryCase objects by a search query, matching against basic case fields and selected-but-incomplete checklist task labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/services/aiI: Empty file, likely a placeholder for an AI image analysis service.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Defines sort options and a sortCases function that sorts SurgeryCase arrays by arrival date or open task count.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines constants for species and sex dropdown options, and the CaseFormData interface used in case creation/editing forms.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation functions for case form fields and utility functions for date parsing, formatting, and conversion between Date objects and nanosecond timestamps.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Renders the main dashboard with a filterable, searchable, sortable grid of CaseCard components, plus a PDF export button.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Provides utilities to extract open task items from a single case and calculate the total open task count across multiple cases.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Renders a settings page for configuring the OpenAI API key, showing validation status and allowing the user to save a new key.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic React hook that returns a debounced version of a given value after a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and updating surgery cases, as well as user profiles and OpenAI config, using a backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines a light-blue-themed OKLCH design token system for the app, with dark mode locked to light values.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf-autotable module.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf module.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript ambient module declaration for tesseract.js, defining interfaces for OCR workers, recognition results, and enums for PSM/OEM modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration mapping OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extending fonts, border radii, and enabling the animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for SurgiPaw tracking existing features, pending UI improvement requests (smaller cards, nav button move, species icons, search enhancements), and architectural metadata.
